description: This requirement is for: Health Canada \\u00u201c- TSPS RFP 1000248304\\u00u201d,\n\nThis procurement has been conditionally set aside under the federal government\\u2019s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
full_summary:
# Task and Solutions Professional Services - Project Administrators and Project Manager Consultants

## Solicitation Number
* Solicitation Number: 1000248304

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Scope: Health Canada has a requirement for up to two (2) TSPS Level 2 Project Administrators and up to four (4) TSPS Level 2 Project Managers to support Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) on an as-and-when-required basis.
* Level of Security Requirement: Common Professional Services Security Requirement #6
	+ The contractor/offeror must hold a valid designated organization screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at all times during the performance of the contract.
	+ Personnel requiring access to protected information or assets must hold a valid reliability status granted or approved by the CSP, PWGSC.
	+ The contractor/offeror must not remove protected information or assets from the work site and ensure that its personnel are made aware of and comply with this restriction.

## Technical Requirements
* Estimated Level of Effort:
	+ 800 days for Project Administrator resources
	+ 2400 days for Project Manager resources
* Estimated Quantity of Commodity: Tier 1 – TSPS – up to 3.75M

## Commercial Requirements
* The procurement is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.
* Suppliers must be qualified through the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply.

## Trade Agreements
* This government procurement is governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* Additionally, it is subject to the following free trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information
* Yvonne Murphy
* Phone: (343) 543-1965
* Email: yvonne.murphy@hc-sc.gc.ca
